short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Plus allows you to highlight the required text, which will help you quickly find the information you need on any page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With one click of a button you can enjoy a focused search experience without distraction
Our main features:
1. Double click on any text, and it will highlight all appearances of a same text on any web page!
2. Double click on any text to find selected term.

Your search experience is important!!! Please try our toolkit, as it will rich your browsing experience with useful tools like text highlighting and find for anything from anywhere!

"SearchPlus" is a plugin that neutralizes the full of distractions environment and thus enables a fast search experience that saves valuable time for the searcher enriching him with relevant results.

For any customer service team assistance, please email us at support@searchplus.site

Feature:
- Search term highlight
- Text on page highlight
- Allow search of any selected text
